metadata.title: CVE-2017-6435 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The parse_string_node function in bplist.c in libimobiledevice libplist 1.12 allows local users to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted plist file.

criterions.comment: libplist package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.2').
